name: Brunston Poon
body:
### Workspace Welcome
Welcome to the github.io-powered page for @brupoon. 

### Projects
[stellarpy](http://st.brunston.net/) - stellar spectra reduction and analysis software in python  
[nextTwilight](http://next.brunston.net/) - astronomy-related python scripts  
[blackfork](http://blackfork.brunston.net/) - evolving algorithm for playing blackjack  
[advEng](http://ae.brunston.net/) - work related to SPS Advanced Engineering 2014-2015  

### Bio & Links
Brunston Poon is a high school senior at St. Paul's School. Visit [his personal website](http://brunston.io/) for work history and further details.  
You can also view his work on [Flickr](https://www.flickr.com/photos/purplejellyfish/sets/72157634537513441).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
